abi: event EventTask(uint256 indexed id, uint256 date, string content, string author, bool done, address owner)
function getTask(uint256 _id) view returns (tuple(uint256 id, uint256 date, string content, string author, bool done, address owner))
function getTasks() view returns (tuple(uint256 id, uint256 date, string content, string author, bool done, address owner)[])
function updateTask(uint256 _id, string _content, string _author) returns (tuple(uint256 id, uint256 date, string content, string author, bool done, address owner))
